column3: Latest;PHNOM PENH------ On the afternoon of July 31
column5: a gusty windstorm caused a metal rod to fly off a building (Gold Tower 42?)
column6: and spear a Lexus parked below.------Meanwhile at jut after 2 pm
column7: a tree came crashing down on a stationary Toyota.------Neither incident caused injuries to people
column8: but citizens are warned to be cautious.
